      • DEFAULT_WINDOW_SIZE_MSEC

        public static final int DEFAULT_WINDOW_SIZE_MSEC
        Recommended default sub window size of subwindows on which features are extracted. Value is 40.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_WINDOW_SHIFT_MSEC

        public static final int DEFAULT_WINDOW_SHIFT_MSEC
        Recommended default window shift size when extracting subwindows for feature extraction. 0 should indicate rolling windows. Value is 20.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CNNClassifier

        public CNNClassifier(ITrainingWindowTransform<double[]> transform,
                     IFeatureGramDescriptor<double[],double[]> fge,
                     boolean useMemCache,
                     boolean useDiskCache,
                     int nEpochs)

      • CNNClassifier

        public CNNClassifier(ITrainingWindowTransform<double[]> transform,
                     IFeatureGramDescriptor<double[],double[]> fge,
                     boolean useMemCache,
                     boolean useDiskCache,
                     int nEpochs,
                     int batchSize,
                     int trainingFolds,
                     int epochScoreHistorySize,
                     double minScoreChangePerEpoch)
        Parameters:
        transform -
        fge -
        useMemCache -
        useDiskCache -
        nEpochs - the maximum number of epochs to use in training
        batchSize - the size of the batch of training data used during training
        trainingFolds - sets the size of the validation data set used during training. If greater than 2, then N-1 folds are used for training and 1 fold is used for validation (error estimation) during training. If set to 0, then the whole training data set is used as the validation set.
        epochScoreHistorySize - the length of history over which to compute the score change per epoch (see minScoreChangePerEpoch parameter)
        minScoreChangePerEpoch - used to control early stopping such that if the change in score per epoch is less than this number, then training will stop before the max number of epochs. Set to 0 to disable early stopping.

      • CNNClassifier

        public CNNClassifier(ITrainingWindowTransform<double[]> transform,

                     boolean useDiskCache,
                     int nEpochs,
                     int batchSize,
                     int trainingFolds)
        Deprecated. in favor of #CNNClassifier(ITrainingWindowTransform, IFeatureGramDescriptor, boolean, boolean, int, int, int)

    • Method Detail

      • trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures

        protected IFixedClassifier<double[]> trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures(Iterable<? extends ILabeledFeatureGram<double[]>[]> features)
                                                             throws AISPException
        Description copied from class: AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier
        Build the classifier from the given set of features. If this is called, then the iterable has at least one feature array in it. AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier.primaryTrainingLabel has been set to the value passed to AbstractFixableClassifier.train(String, Iterable) when this is called and should be used by the implementation to define the labels on which the model is trained.
        Specified by:
        trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures in class AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier<double[],double[]>
        Parameters:
        features - the iterable over arrays of labeled features. Each array of features corresponds to an individual training sample as provided to AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier.trainFixedClassifierOnData(String, Iterable) as part of the iterable provided there.
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        AISPException

      • createNetworkConfig

        protected org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.MultiLayerConfiguration createNetworkConfig(FeatureDataSetIterator featureDataSet)
                                                                          throws AISPException

        featureDataSet -
        Returns:
        Throws:
